verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after שָׁ֣ב <S%H7725><s%> shav was returned שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, And it came to pass when Saul מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rei from following פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim; the Philistines וַיַּגִּ֤דוּ <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Gi-du that it was told לוֹ֙ lo לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, him saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, Behold David בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar [is] in the wilderness עֵ֥ין 'ein גֶּֽדִי׃ <S%H5872><s%> Ge-di. of Engedi ס sa-Mek

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, Then Saul שְׁלֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> she-Lo-shet three אֲלָפִ֛ים <S%H505><s%> 'a-la-Fim thousand אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish men בָּח֖וּר <S%H970><s%> ba-Chur young מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El; out of all Israel וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech, and went לְבַקֵּ֤שׁ <S%H1245><s%> le-vak-Kesh to seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David וַֽאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> va-'a-na-Shav, and his men עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon צוּרֵ֥י <S%H6697><s%> tzu-Rei the rocks הַיְּעֵלִֽים׃ <S%H3277><s%> hai-ye-'e-Lim. of the wild goats

וַ֠יָּבֹא <S%H935><s%> Vai-ya-vo And he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about גִּדְר֨וֹת <S%H1448><s%> gid-Rot wall הַצֹּ֤אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon cattle עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> had-De-rech by the way וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham where מְעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> me-'a-Rah, where [was] a cave וַיָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo went in שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul and Saul לְהָסֵ֣ךְ <S%H5526><s%> le-ha-Sech to cover אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lav; his feet וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid and David וַאֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> va-'a-na-Shav, and his men בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <S%H3411><s%> be-yar-ke-Tei in the sides הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> ham-me-'a-Rah of the cave יֹשְׁבִֽים׃ <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vim. remained

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said אַנְשֵׁ֨י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom unto him Behold the day אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'asher- of which אָמַ֧ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar said יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of which the LORD אֵלֶ֗יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha, to you הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I נֹתֵ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> no-Ten unto thee Behold I will deliver אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ; אֹיְבֵיךָ 'o-ye-vei-cha כאֹֽיִבְךָ֙ <S%H341><s%> 'o-yiv-Cha enemy קבְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-De-cha, into thine hand וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Si-ta that thou mayest do לּ֔וֹ lo, כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher of which יִטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> yi-Tav to him as it shall seem good בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei-cha; unto thee וַיָּ֣קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom arose דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, Then David וַיִּכְרֹ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot and cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּנַֽף־ <S%H3671><s%> ke-naf- the skirt הַמְּעִ֥יל <S%H4598><s%> ham-me-'Il robe אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- of which לְשָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> le-sha-'Ul of Saul's בַּלָּֽט׃ <S%H3909><s%> bal-Lat. privily

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei- And it came to pass afterward כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen, after that וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> vai-Yach smote לֵב־ <S%H3820><s%> lev- heart דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid that David's אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To; עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher he כָּרַ֔ת <S%H3772><s%> ka-Rat, him because he had cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּנָ֖ף <S%H3671><s%> ka-Naf skirt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher his לְשָׁאֽוּל׃ <S%H7586><s%> le-sha-'Ul. Saul's ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לַאֲנָשָׁ֜יו <S%H582><s%> la-'a-na-Shav unto his men חָלִ֧ילָה <S%H2486><s%> cha-Li-lah forbid לִּ֣י li מֵֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- should אֶעֱשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> 'e-'e-Seh that I should do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this לַֽאדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> la-do-Ni unto my master לִמְשִׁ֣יחַ <S%H4899><s%> lim-Shi-ach anointed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God לִשְׁלֹ֥חַ <S%H7971><s%> lish-Lo-ach to stretch forth יָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand בּ֑וֹ bo; כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- since מְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> me-Shi-ach against him seeing he [is] the anointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וַיְשַׁסַּ֨ע <S%H8156><s%> vay-shas-Sa' stayed דָּוִ֤ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid So David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲנָשָׁיו֙ <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shav his men בַּדְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> bad-de-va-Rim, with these words וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not נְתָנָ֖ם <S%H5414><s%> ne-ta-Nam and suffered לָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> la-Kum them not to rise אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul; against Saul וְשָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> ve-sha-'Ul But Saul קָ֥ם <S%H6965><s%> kam rose up מֵהַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> me-ham-me-'a-Rah out of the cave וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> bad-Da-rech. on [his] way ס sa-Mek

וַיָּ֨קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom also arose דָּוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid David אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei- after כֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen, after that וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze afterward and went out; מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at המערה ham-me-'a-rah כמֵֽהַמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> me-ham-me-'a-Rah, cave קוַיִּקְרָ֧א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra and cried אַֽחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-rei- behind שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul Saul לֵאמֹ֖ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor saying אֲדֹנִ֣י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni My lord הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; the king וַיַּבֵּ֤ט <S%H5027><s%> vai-yab-Bet looked שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul And when Saul אַֽחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav, behind וַיִּקֹּ֨ד <S%H6915><s%> vai-yik-Kod stooped דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid him David אַפַּ֛יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim with his face אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu. and bowed ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David לְשָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> le-sha-'Ul, to Saul לָ֧מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תִשְׁמַ֛ע <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma' Wherefore hearest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei words אָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam thou men's לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, Behold David מְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Kesh seeketh רָעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'a-Te-cha. adversity

הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold הַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom Behold this day הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U have seen עֵינֶ֗יךָ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nei-cha, thine eyes אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after נְתָנְךָ֩ <S%H5414><s%> ne-ta-ne-Cha had delivered יְהוָ֨ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh how that the LORD הַיּ֤וֹם׀ <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom thee to day בְּיָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di into mine hand בַּמְּעָרָ֔ה <S%H4631><s%> bam-me-'a-Rah, in the cave וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar and [some] bade לַהֲרָגֲךָ֖ <S%H2026><s%> la-ha-ra-ga-Cha [me] kill וַתָּ֣חָס <S%H2347><s%> vat-Ta-chos thee but [mine eye] spared עָלֶ֑יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha; on וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar, thee and I said לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I will not אֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> 'esh-Lach I will not put forth יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Di mine hand בַּֽאדֹנִ֔י <S%H113><s%> ba-do-Ni, against my lord כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> me-Shi-ach anointed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for he [is] the LORD'S הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְאָבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> ve-'a-Vi Moreover my father רְאֵ֔ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh, see גַּ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> Gam, Indeed רְאֵ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh yea see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּנַ֥ף <S%H3671><s%> ke-Naf the skirt מְעִילְךָ֖ <S%H4598><s%> me-'i-le-Cha of thy robe בְּיָדִ֑י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di; in my hand כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בְּכָרְתִי֩ <S%H3772><s%> be-cha-re-Ti for in that I cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כְּנַ֨ף <S%H3671><s%> ke-Naf the skirt מְעִֽילְךָ֜ <S%H4598><s%> me-'i-le-Cha of thy robe וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and did not הֲרַגְתִּ֗יךָ <S%H2026><s%> ha-rag-Ti-cha, and killed דַּ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> da' thee not know וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> u-re-'Eh thou and see כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֵ֨ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there בְּיָדִ֜י <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Di in mine hand רָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah that [there is] neither evil וָפֶ֙שַׁע֙ <S%H6588><s%> va-Fe-sha' nor transgression וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- have not חָטָ֣אתִי <S%H2398><s%> cha-Ta-ti and I have not sinned לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְאַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tah you צֹדֶ֥ה <S%H6658><s%> tzo-Deh against thee yet thou huntest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my soul לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Tah. to take

יִשְׁפֹּ֤ט <S%H8199><s%> yish-Pot judge יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵינֶ֔ךָ <S%H996><s%> u-vei-Ne-cha, between וּנְקָמַ֥נִי <S%H5358><s%> u-ne-ka-Ma-ni avenge יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh between me and thee and the LORD מִמֶּ֑ךָּ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka; but וְיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Di me of thee but mine hand לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> tih-yeh- become בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after יֹאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> yo-Mar, As saith מְשַׁל֙ <S%H4912><s%> me-Shal the proverb הַקַּדְמֹנִ֔י <S%H6931><s%> hak-kad-mo-Ni, of the ancients מֵרְשָׁעִ֖ים <S%H7561><s%> me-re-sha-'Im condemn יֵ֣צֵא <S%H3318><s%> Ye-tze proceedeth רֶ֑שַׁע <S%H7562><s%> Re-sha'; Wickedness וְיָדִ֖י <S%H3027><s%> ve-ya-Di but mine hand לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> tih-yeh- become בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.
